text: 5.13: 2 Te 3.11Mbe vhɨra kha tɨvar muunga. Mbe vhukvhuga kɨvgiap, fhura pheni bogbogɨ rurga. Mbe vhukvhugi tɨvara muunga fhuvara. Mbe vhɨra guigira kha tɨva vuzvugirga. Mbe harigi gumgi gu mbigi mbui tɨvi mbararav, mben vhɨri gorav, mbe zɨn maaŋv, mbe suanga. Mbe maaŋ muuŋv, mbe suanga buni vhɨrve nzerarga fhu. Nza mba khesharigi buni suanga fhu.
